note.p: German composer and music journalist. Pupil of Franz Liszt. Director, Musikverein, Straßburg (Strasbourg), 1878; music director, Straßburger Stadttheater, and teacher, Straßburg Conservatory, 1879–81. Teacher at the Köln Conservatory, 1885; music critic, Kölnische Zeitung, 1887. Made a recording of a Chopin piano concerto on an Edison phonograph in 1890.
